metadata.title: CVE-2022-27666 on Ubuntu 14.04 LTS (trusty) - medium
metadata.description: A heap buffer overflow flaw was found in IPsec ESP transformation code innet/ipv4/esp4.c and net/ipv6/esp6.c. This flaw allows a local attacker witha normal user privilege to overwrite kernel heap objects and may cause alocal privilege escalation threat.

criterions.comment: linux: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support').
linux-lts-xenial: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support').
